mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TOURS T LEFT JOIN IMG I ON T.TOUR_NO = I.TOUR_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT TOUR_NO, AVG(RATING) AS RATING FROM REVIEWS GROUP BY TOUR_NO ) TEMP1 ON T.TOUR_NO = TEMP1.TOUR_NO INNER JOIN ( SELECT T1.THEME_NO, T1.THEME_NAME, T2.THEME_NO AS PARENT_NO, T2.THEME_NAME AS PARENT_NAME FROM THEME T1 INNER JOIN THEME T2 ON T1.THEME_PARENT_NO = T2.THEME_NO )TEMP2 ON T.THEME_NO = TEMP2.THEME_NO ORDER BY NVL(RATING, 0) DESC
SELECT TITLE, "COMMENT", RATING, USER_FIRSTNAME, USER_LASTNAME FROM REVIEWS R INNER JOIN TOURS T ON T.TOUR_NO = R.TOUR_NO INNER JOIN USERS U ON U.USER_NO = R.USER_NO
